sonic
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which sonic installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using sonic, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load sonic/20180202-gompi-2020a
```
